user_query: I need the currency exchange rates for today, with the base currency set as USD. Also, fetch the latest price of the fund with the ISIN LU0690375182. Search for the company 'Apple Inc.' in the ESG news and find out if there is any news available. Finally, provide me with the United States employment data.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current currency exchange rates with USD as the base currency.
Get the latest price of the fund identified by ISIN LU0690375182.
Search for ESG news related to 'Apple Inc.' and check for available news.
Provide the latest employment data for the United States.
